title.en: I Will Live as a Supporting Role in This Life

altTitles.en: I Will Live as a Supporting Character in This Life
I Will Live This Life as a Side Character
Thus I Promised to Live My Life as an Extra

altTitles.ja: 今世は脇役として生きていきます

altTitles.th: ชาตินี้ฉันขอเป็นแค่ตัวประกอบ

description.en:
Lysia remembers her past life of suffering in Korea's entrance exam culture that only values first place.

'Forget it. In this life, I'm going to live for myself.'

The life of a supporting character that doesn't get any attention!

But I'm troubled that my appearance and abilities are too outstanding for me to live quietly as a supporting character!

After being admitted to the academy, I tried to live as an unnoticeable shadow... But I keep getting involved with men that everyone pays attention to.

From the crown prince who hides his scheming nature behind a kind mask, to the casanova who is the most popular senior, and an expressionless classmate who seems to hide a lot of secrets.

'Please just leave me alone!'

I want to live quietly!

---
Pressured by her demanding mother and hated by others for her intelligence, Han Narae led a miserable life, dying tragically at a young age. Reborn as Lysia Ambrose, the magical daughter of a count, all she wants to do this time is live a quiet life while attending the prestigious Asteria Academy. Though she tries her best to hide her true powers and live normally, she proves surprisingly popular. Now rubbing elbows with school celebrities, will Lysia’s plan to fade into the background fail?
description.id: Lysia hidup kembali menjadi tokoh pendukung dalam sebuah novel. Tidak ingin hidup tertekan seperti di kehidupan sebelumnya, ia bertekad ingin hidup tenang kali ini. Namun, sialnya, paras serta kemampuannya membuat dia mencolok, dan setelah masuk akademi dia malah terlibat dengan para pria yang menjadi incaran orang-orang padahal dia sudah berusaha untuk tidak menarik perhatian.
description.zh: 因为一场突如其来的车祸，被考试折磨得苦不堪言的李娜莱重生为了莉西娅。备受前世记忆困扰的莉西娅决心这一世一定要做一个平凡的、不受关注的配角。但是，不论是外貌或是能力都十分出众的她，真的能如愿过上平静的生活吗？

biography.en:
Associated Names:
Yoo Ye-rang

Name (in native language):
유예랑
